item.description:
Come to our Sangha Refuge Potluck and Sharing. It will be held at Lori Rugle's house on Wed. 12/28 at 6:30. It's a nice way to meet new friends, share food,  talk about your personal concerns with trustworthy people, and have a good time.

Contact Lori at lrugle@hotmail.com for directions,  and details.  Also email her of you are coming in ordr to tell her what will be your food/beverage offering. All Sangha members are friends are welcome.Namu Amida Butsu

******This event is not at the BFF of Ct but at Lori's condo a couple of miles away in Middlefield. Email Lori for directions.
